name: HappyBlock
description: An enhanced buildingTetris puzzle game. Render the scene using 3D. And better in HappyBlock than ever. The game can exercise your responsiveness and bring you a pleasant experience. Many beautiful scenes, multiple sound effects, colorful blocks. The blocks are successfully spliced and will be converted into gold coins.
